Emojis codes and descriptions data.

This data comes from "Unicode.org", http://unicode.org/emoji/charts/full-emoji-list.html. The data are codes and descriptions of Emojis.

emojis

Format

A tibble with two variables and 2,623 observations.

Examples

emojis
#> # A tibble: 2,623 x 2
#>            code                     description
#>           <chr>                           <chr>
#>  1 "\U0001f600"                   grinning face
#>  2 "\U0001f601"  beaming face with smiling eyes
#>  3 "\U0001f602"          face with tears of joy
#>  4 "\U0001f923"   rolling on the floor laughing
#>  5 "\U0001f603"     grinning face with big eyes
#>  6 "\U0001f604" grinning face with smiling eyes
#>  7 "\U0001f605"        grinning face with sweat
#>  8 "\U0001f606"         grinning squinting face
#>  9 "\U0001f609"                    winking face
#> 10 "\U0001f60a"  smiling face with smiling eyes
#> # ... with 2,613 more rows
